lead_paragraph: Inter Milan's Ivan Perisic scored with almost the last kick of the game to snatch a 2-2 draw against AC Milan in Serie A under new coach Stefano Pioli after their neighbours twice led through Suso in Sunday's derby.

headline.print_headline: Inter's Perisic Snatches Last-Gasp Draw in Milan Derby
headline.main: Inter's Perisic Snatches Last-Gasp Draw in Milan Derby

snippet: Inter Milan's Ivan Perisic scored with almost the last kick of the game to snatch a 2-2 draw against AC Milan in Serie A under new coach Stefano Pioli after their neighbours twice led through Suso in Sunday's derby....
